text:
[Verse]
Night sky glowing bright
Stars above take flight
Whispers in the breeze
Heart begins to seize

[Verse 2]
Moonlight on the shore
Footsteps
We want more
Shadows dance around
Lost but now we're found

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams
They shine
Across the sky
So fine
Hold me close tonight
Everything's alright

[Verse 3]
Echoes in the dark
Like a gentle spark
Weave together dreams
More than what it seems

[Bridge]
Feel the world serene
In this silver sheen
Lost in this embrace
A timeless
Sacred place

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams
They shine
Across the sky
So fine
Hold me close tonight
Everything's alright
title: Moonlit Dreams
